comments.body:
@liggitt per @jayunit100 comment on previous file, we cannot set default labels on namespaces that uses generated Names, is that right?

If so, probably this test case should be removed?

this test is fine, don't remove it... it's covering the case where a name is specified on the namespace.

the integration test covers the generated name scenario (and is currently failing, demonstrating the create path of a namespace with a generated name is not working properly... looks like the namespace strategy Canonicalize method needs to add the same label-setting logic to cover this path)
OK, recovered the test, will check the Canonicalize to see what can be done there
